thread.title: Motorola Edge 40 (8/256 GB) is in a huge promotion that tempts at a low price
thread.title_full: Motorola Edge 40 (8/256 GB) is in a huge promotion that tempts at a low price

author: Benjamin Blair
title: Motorola Edge 40 (8/256 GB) is in a huge promotion that tempts at a low price
text:
At first glance, the Motorola Edge 40 has everything you need: inductive charging, water resistance, a camera with OIS and a great display. But is a great promotion enough to make you buy a smartphone? Make sure to check the specifications before making a decision.
- Motorola Edge 40 I got a great discount.
- The phone runs on the Dimensity 8020 system.
- The model's screen is a POLED type with a diameter of 6.55 inches.
Amazon from Italy, which handles sales and shipping,
Organized an interesting promotion. Motorola Edge 40 In version 8/256 GB Now the costs are just including shipping 306 eurosthat is, almost 1,325 Polish zloty.
If my memory serves me correctly,
This is the cheapest offer in the history of this model! Against the background of shops in Poland You can save more than PLN 200.
Motorola Edge 40 capabilities
You won't lack performance, it will take care of it MediaTek 8020 dimensions together with 8 GB RAM (LPDDR4X). Memory is allocated for data 256 GB (UFS 3.1). Unfortunately, it cannot be extended.
It's on the front Boled 6,55″ With curved edges, resolution Full HD+refreshing 144 HzMaximum brightness 1200 rivets And content management HDR 10+. However, the most important sub-point of the specification is: IP68 certified! I know that many ManiaKs cannot imagine a phone without this standard.
Device optics:
- Main camera with 50 MP matrix, OIS, physical size 1/1.5″ and f/1.4 aperture,
- Ultra Wide Angle Lens + Macro Vision with 13MP matrix, 120° viewing angle, f/2.2 aperture,
- Selfie camera with 32-megapixel matrix and f/2.4 aperture.
Watch the Motorola Edge 40 test!
[TEST | Motorola Edge 40. Ta przepiękna brzytwa wagi piórkowej jest równie „gorąca”, co gorąca]
Battery supported 67 watts And absorb it 4400 mAh. It is also worth noting Wireless charging (15 watts)! This is another one Must have ManiaKa respects himself! The appropriate charger is included in the kit. The phone is working normally under control Android 13.
Motorola Edge 40 Supports communication 5GHe has a unit NFCmodem Bluetooth 5.2 I Wi-Fi 6Dual SIM, and a USB Type C (2.0) port as well Stereo speakers (Dolby Atmos). The device lacks a 3.5mm audio jack. To listen to music via cable, you need an adapter.
By the way, check out Google's list of smartphones receiving an important update.
[Masz smartfon Google Pixel? To koniecznie sprawdź listę z szalenie ważną aktualizacją]
Don't miss the next promotion
